name: 王耀德
objective: 讓同學了解電磁學之基本觀念與應用，課程內容將包括：1.向量分析 2.靜電學 3.鏡磁學 4.物質內的電、磁場 5.時變場與守恆律 6.電磁波 7.傳輸線與波導 8.天線與輻射
schedule:
week 1: Review of Magnetostatics
week 2~3: Magnetic Fields in Matter
week 4~6: Electrodynamics
week 7: Conservation Laws
week 8~10: Electromagnetic Waves
(week 8 or 9: midterm exam.)
week 11~13: Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines
week 13~15: Waveguides and Cavity Resonators
week 16~17: Antennas and Radiating Systems
week 18: final exam.
scorePolicy:
quiz: 10% x 3
midterm: 25%
final: 25%
homework: 20%
participation: extra 5%
materials:
main text: Introduction to Electrodynamics, 3rd ed., by David J. Griffiths
for applications and practices: Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2nd ed., by David K. Cheng
